rules_text: Deadeye – Pay 3 life: Create a Junk token. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped. A Junk token is an artifact with “{T}: Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
